title: Dutch court rules against AI written wedding vows
description: A Dutch court broke the hearts of a couple after ruling that their marriage, whose wedding vows were drafted with the help of artificial intelligence, was not valid.
content:
A Dutch court broke the hearts of a couple after ruling that their marriage, whose wedding vows were drafted with the help of artificial intelligence, was not valid.

title: AI breakthrough in antibiotics discovery
description: Artificial intelligence is revolutionizing antibiotic discovery, potentially tackling antibiotic-resistant bacteria and saving lives.

title: Artificial Intelligence: Revolutionizing Every Aspect of Life - BRIEF-Musk's X Could Be Banned In Britain Over AI Chatbot Row - The Telegraph
description: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is rapidly redefining the way we live, work, and interact. No longer confined to the realm of science fiction, AI is now a driving force behind innovations across all sectors— from healthcare and finance to entertainment and manufacturing. Its impact is far-reaching, transforming industries, reshaping economies, and influencing the way we navigate daily life.

title: Cleveland detective ‘misled’ judge about use of AI in murder investigation, ruling says
description: Judge Richard McMonagle reaffirmed a prior ruling tossing out evidence for a case in which a suspect was identified via artificial intelligence.
content:
CLEVELAND, Ohio -- A murder trial remains in jeopardy after a judge ruled against Cleveland police for their use of artificial intelligence to identify a suspect.

title: Ticker: AI in the inbox; Jobless applications tick up
